title: Power - total power in resistors R1 and R2

content.question: A battery with <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> <math alttext=" uppercase script E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi></math> is connected to two resistors of resistance <math alttext="R sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, as shown in the figure. What is the total power dissipated by the resistors?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator uppercase script E squared, and denominator R sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator uppercase script E squared, and denominator R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator uppercase script E squared, and denominator R sub 1, end sub, plus R sub 2, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="uppercase script E squared, times open parenthesis, the fraction 1 over R sub 1, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over R sub 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="uppercase script E squared, times open parenthesis, the fraction 1 over R sub 1, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over R sub 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
